channel.title: Donor on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Donor on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Holiday Gift 2010
item.description: I didn’t have any problem communicating it to Mom. She knew it since I was 10 years old or so. I had told her about this wish and so did she. We both want not just organs but entire body to be donated when we pass away. This is a picture of an eye donation card I signed nearly 15 years ago! (I must have been 10 years old or so.
